Daniel__02.1__The second year: : Viz., from the death of his father Nabopolassar; for he had reigned before as partner with his father in the empire.
Daniel__02.2__The Chaldeans: : That is, the astrologers, that pretended to divine by stars.
Daniel__02.39__Another kingdom: : Viz., that of the Medes and Persians. Ibid.
Daniel__02.39__Third kingdom: : Viz., that of Alexander the Great.
Daniel__02.40__The fourth kingdom: : Some understand this of the successors of Alexander, the kings of Syria and Egypt, others of the Roman empire, and its civil wars.
Daniel__02.44__A kingdom: : Viz., the kingdom of Christ in the Catholic Church which cannot be destroyed.
